definition: abbr. for Canada 加拿大[Jia1 na2 da4]/surname Jia

to add/plus/(used after an adverb such as 不, 大, 稍 etc, and before a disyllabic verb, to indicate that the action of the verb is applied to sth or sb previously mentioned)/to apply (restrictions etc) to (sb)/to give (support, consideration etc) to (sth)
to decorate/to embellish/to repair/to build/to write/to cultivate/to study/to take (a class)
decoration/ornament/to decorate/to adorn/to hide/to conceal (a fault)/excuse (to hide a fault)/to play a role (in opera)/to impersonate
water flea (small crustacean of genus Daphnia)
variant of 矇騙|蒙骗[meng1 pian4]
(of an uneducated person) to mingle with the cognoscenti/to pose as a culture lover/to be a culture snob/having pretensions to culture
to make a significant advance in one's career (idiom)/to get one's big break
to make up/elaborately made up woman
variant of 附會|附会[fu4 hui4]
